event.title: Conference about Free Software organised by the SPD in Berlin

body.p: On the 7th of April, the SPD party organises a public conference about Free Software, which entails a panel discussion. Meeting takes place at the Bundesparteizentrale, Wilhelmstraße 141 / Ecke Stresemannstraße, at 7 p.m. The event will be held in German.

Bernhard Reiter, an long-time and experienced FSFE member who you may know will speak there. Nico will also be there with information materials and the topic is "Cost-effectiveness improvement through Free Software implementation".
